noun.description: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.
examples: an upward trend in sales and profit margins
the latest trends in modern dance

noun.description: A topic that is the subject of many posts on a social media website within a short period of time.
examples: for more than 20 days in a row, most of the top Twitter trends were Olympics-related

verb.description: Change or develop in a general direction.
(of a topic) be the subject of many posts on a social media website within a short period of time.
examples: I've just taken a quick look at what's trending on Twitter right now

origin: Old English trendan revolve, rotate, of Germanic origin; compare with trundle. The verb sense turn in a specified direction dates from the late 16th century, and gave rise to the figurative use develop in a general direction in the mid 19th century, a development paralleled in the noun.
